TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceDebugBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 启用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的调试和帮助信息功能。

span.span: Enables debugging and help information features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从配置文件或以编程方式使用 属性，可以使托管异常信息流到客户端以进行调试，还可以向在 Web 浏览器中浏览该服务的用户发布 HTML 信息文件。Use the properties from a configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers. 将 属性设置为， `true` 以指示 WCF 将 SOAP 错误中的托管异常信息返回给客户端以供调试。Set the property to `true` to instruct WCF to return managed exception information in SOAP faults to clients for debugging purposes. > [!CAUTION] > 将托管异常信息返回给客户端可能存在安全风险，因为异常详细信息会公开有关内部服务实现的信息，而未经授权的客户端可能会利用这些信息。Returning managed exception information to clients can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal service implementation that could be used by unauthorized clients. 此外，虽然 属性也可以通过编程方式进行设置，但在部署时容易忘记禁用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由于涉及到一些安全问题，因此强烈建议您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用应用程序配置文件将 属性的值设置为 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 仅在受控调试方案中才这样做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. 有关与托管异常信息相关的安全问题的详细信息，请参阅 [在协定和服务中指定和处理错误](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services)。For more information about the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services). 当使用 HTML 浏览器查看服务时， 和 属性指示服务发布 HTML 帮助文件。The and properties instruct the service to publish HTML help files when the service is viewed using an HTML browser. 和 属性控制所查看的 HTML 帮助页的位置。The and properties control the location of the HTML help page that is viewed. 若要使用配置文件启用或禁用其中一个 功能，请执行以下操作：To enable or disable one of the features using a configuration file: 1. 将 `behaviorConfiguration` 属性添加到 WCF 服务的[ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素。Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element for your WCF service. 在元素上配置终结点行为 [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) ; 服务元素[ < > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)上的服务行为。Endpoint behaviors are configured on [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) elements; service behaviors on [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) elements. 2. 添加到或创建[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)节，并使用与步骤1中的属性值相匹配的名称将[ < > 行为](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素添加到中 `behaviorConfiguration` 。Add to or create a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) section and add a [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1. 使用[ < endpointBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors)元素配置终结点行为; 使用[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)元素配置服务行为。Endpoint behaviors are configured using an [<endpointBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors) element; service behaviors are configured using a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) element. 3. 将[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素添加到步骤2中的[ < 行为 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素，并启用或禁用适用于方案的各种属性。Add a [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element to the [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario. 有关具体示例的信息，请参见“示例”部分。For a specific example, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用配置文件来启用 HTML 帮助页功能，将 SOAP 错误内部的异常信息返回给客户端以供调试，以及启用元数据支持。The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes, in addition to enabling metadata support. 此配置文件演示以下用于添加对 功能的支持的基本步骤：This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the features: - 因为 类型是一个 实现，所以表示服务类型的[ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素具有的行为配置标识符 `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"` 。Because the type is an implementation, the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`. - 因为 类型是一个实现，所以 会将一个[ < > 行为](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素添加到[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)节中。Because the type is an implementation a [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) section. 设置 `name` [ < 行为 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素的特性，其值是 `behaviorConfiguration` [ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素的特性的标识符。Set the `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element. 在本例中，该值为 `metadataAndDebug`。In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`. - 添加具有不同属性集的[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素，并将其设置为所需的配置。Add a [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration. 在本例中，`httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 属性值设置为 `true`。In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`. [!code-xml[ServiceDebugBehaviorConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicedebugbehaviorconfig/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个具有以下默认值的 对象：The constructor creates a object with the following defaults: - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 属性为支持 HTTP 请求的服务的基址。The property is the base address of the service that supports HTTP requests. - 为支持 HTTPS 请求的服务的基址。The is the base address of the service that supports HTTPS requests.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否在由 属性控制的地址发布 HTML 帮助页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) publishes an HTML help page at the address controlled by the property.

value.span: 如果 WCF 发布 HTML 帮助页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if WCF publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `false`，可禁止发布对 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。Set the property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 若要确保在由 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，您必须将此属性设置为 `true`，并且必须满足以下条件之一：To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true: - 属性是支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. - 服务有支持 HTTP 协议方案的基址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. 尽管为 属性指定不支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用配置文件来启用 HTML 帮助页功能，并将 SOAP 错误内部的异常信息返回给客户端以供调试。The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes. 此配置文件演示以下用于添加对 功能的支持的基本步骤：This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the features: - 因为 类型是一个 实现，所以表示服务类型的[ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素具有的行为配置标识符 `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"` 。Because the type is a implementation, the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`. - 同样，由于 类型是一个实现，因此会将 一个[ < > 行为](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素添加到[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)节中。Again, because the type is an implementation a [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) section. `name` [ < 行为 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素的特性，其中的值是 `behaviorConfiguration` [ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素的特性的标识符。The `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element. 在本例中，该值为 `metadataAndDebug`。In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`. - 添加具有不同属性集的[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素，并将其设置为所需的配置。Add a [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration. 在本例中，`httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 属性值设置为 `true`。In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`. [!code-xml[ServiceDebugBehaviorConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicedebugbehaviorconfig/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置发布 HTML 帮助文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.

value.span: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户看到的自定义 HTML 帮助文件基于 HTTP 的相对或绝对 URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可允许使用自定义 HTML 帮助文件，例如从 HTML 浏览器的 HTTP/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。Use the property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request such as that of an HTML browser. HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下：The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows: - 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTP 请求的服务基址的值再加上此属性值。If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests plus this property value. - 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTP 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. - 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTP 请求，则会引发异常。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown. 仅当 属性为 `true` 时，才应用此属性。This property is applied only in the case that the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ HttpsHelpPageBinding { System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否在由 属性控制的地址通过 HTTPS 返回 HTML 帮助文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address controlled by the property.

value.span: 如果将 HTML 帮助文件返回到发出 HTTPS/GET 请求（如 HTML 浏览器的请求）的客户端，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request such as that of an HTML browser; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `false`，可禁止发布对 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。Set the property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 若要确保在由 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，您必须将此属性设置为 `true`，并且必须满足以下条件之一：To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true: - 属性是支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. - 服务有支持 HTTPS 协议方案的基址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. 尽管为 属性指定不支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.

summary.span: 获取或设置发布 HTML 文件以便使用 HTTPS 进行检索的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.

value.span: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户看到的自定义 HTML 帮助文件基于 HTTPS 的相对或绝对 URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可允许使用自定义 HTML 帮助文件，例如从 HTML 浏览器的 HTTPS/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。Use the property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request such as that of an HTML browser. HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下：The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows: - 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTPS 请求的服务基址的值再加上此属性值。If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests plus this property value. - 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTPS 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. - 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTPS 请求，则会引发异常。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown. 仅当 属性为 `true` 时，才应用此属性。This property is applied only in the case that the property is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在返回客户端以供调试的 SOAP 错误详细信息中是否包含托管异常信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.

value.span: 如果 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 在 SOAP 错误中返回托管异常信息，以便进行客户端调试，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client debugging purposes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `true` ，以指示 WCF 在 SOAP 错误中将托管异常信息返回给客户端以简化调试。Set the property to `true` to instruct WCF to return managed exception information to the client in SOAP faults to ease debugging. > [!CAUTION] > 将托管异常信息返回给客户端可能存在安全风险，因为异常详细信息会公开有关内部服务实现的信息，而未经授权的客户端可能会利用这些信息。Returning managed exception information to clients can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal service implementation that could be used by unauthorized clients. 此外，虽然 属性也可以通过编程方式进行设置，但在部署时容易忘记禁用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由于涉及到一些安全问题，因此强烈建议您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用应用程序配置文件将 属性的值设置为 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 仅在受控调试方案中才这样做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在协定和服务中指定和处理错误](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services)。For more information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用配置文件来启用 HTML 帮助页功能，并将 SOAP 错误内部的异常信息返回给客户端以供调试。The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes. 此配置文件演示以下用于添加对 功能的支持的基本步骤：This configuration file shows the following basic steps to adding support for the features: - 因为 类型是一个 实现，所以表示服务类型的[ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素具有的行为配置标识符 `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"` 。Because the type is an implementation, the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element that represents the service type has a behavior configuration identifier of `behaviorConfiguration="metadataAndDebug"`. - 同样，由于 类型是一个实现，因此会将 一个[ < > 行为](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素添加到[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)节中。Again, because the type is an implementation a [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element is added to a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) section. 设置 `name` [ < 行为 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素的特性，其值是 `behaviorConfiguration` [ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素的特性的标识符。Set the `name` attribute of the [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element the value of which is the identifier of the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute of the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element. 在本例中，该值为 `metadataAndDebug`。In this case, the value is `metadataAndDebug`. - 添加具有不同属性集的[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素，并将其设置为所需的配置。Add a [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element with the various attributes set to the desired configuration. 在本例中，`httpHelpPageEnabled` 和 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 属性值设置为 `true`。In this case, the `httpHelpPageEnabled` and `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` attribute values are set to `true`. [!code-xml[ServiceDebugBehaviorConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicedebugbehaviorconfig/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]
